name: Langzila
info: This is a Doctor management website and user manage their inventory. The Site features firebase authentication. User can sign in Manage inventory and book an appoinment to the doctor
details: This is a Language learning platfrom.
The site has many item with quixtest, voice learning and classroom section.
User can book an event for upcomming learning season.
User can learn by audio, video and support season.
User can take multiple activities as like canvas and typing text.

name: Graphi

name: TaskList

name: Vitic
info: This is a Electronics inventory management service website and user manage their inventory. The Site features firebase authentication. User can sign in Manage inventory.
details: This is a Electronics inventory management website.
The Site features firebase authentication. User can sign in Manage inventory.
The admin can upload a product and also delete it.
The admin can make admin from the users.
MongoDB database and Node Express server and CRUD operation implemented.

name: GetCycle
info: This is a car warehouse management service website. The Site features firebase authentication. MongoDB database and Node Express server integrated with Front End UI and CRUD operation implemented.
details: This is a car warehouse management service website.
The Site features to user can buy products and add products.
The Supplier can add a product and delete it
The Supplier can update his products quantity.
MongoDB database and Node Express server integrated.
